title: Quantity of ice cream consumed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2008 - 2012 , by age
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Consumption in grams. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
In general Consumption in grams has stayed the same over the Year.
Consumption in grams is roughly constant from 1.5-3_years to 19-64_years, gradually increasing from 19-64_years to 4-10_years, and finally roughly decreasing from 4-10_years to 65_years_and_over.
The line significantly increased by 8.0 from Year 19-64_years to 4-10_years.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 19-64_years and 4-10_years.
The highest Consumption in grams, of value 13.0 was reached at Year 4-10_years
Minimum Consumption in grams about 5.0 was reached at Year 19-64_years
